channel.title: My game client doesn't open after I compile?
channel.description: Okay, I compile and run the sever. Both black boxes are ready and no errors are there. But no client window opens. How do I actually play in the server?

item.title: My game client doesn't open after I compile?
item.dc:creator: @username_of_a_dag username of a dag
item.description:
@username_of_a_dag wrote:

Okay, sorry. What I meant was are there any decent clients out there. Which one is the best in your opinions…

Read full topic
item.source: My game client doesn't open after I compile?

item.title: My game client doesn't open after I compile?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“username of a dag, post:7, topic:377689”][quote author=Cres link=topic=473577.msg3463112#msg3463112 date=1294690595]
i suggest Google
let me explain how it works :
you write w/e shit you want and you press Enter.
then the magical device searches for anything in the history of mankind that has to do with that word.
it will then list any references to that word in a handy list which is made possible by the gnomes who have been working on this truly fascinating device for years.

[/quote]

Go flame your bitch bro, I’m not here for that shit.

And let me rephrase the question. Any suggestions for a DECENT 508 client out of the 100s out there?[/quote]

i respect my bitch ; gets you laid more often.
and if you ask somthing like that here , it means you didnt try google xD

Read full topic
